original_text: For as Jonah was three days and three nights in the belly of a huge fish, so the Son of Man will be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.
korean_text: 요나가 밤낮 사흘 동안 큰 물고기 뱃속에 있었던 것 같이 인자도 밤낮 사흘 동안 땅 속에 있으리라

sentences.original_text: For as Jonah was three days and three nights
in the belly of a huge fish,
so the Son of Man will be three days and three nights
in the heart of the earth.
